DOC.brief_summary: To investigate renal impairment impact pharmacokinetics nalmefene
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Properties Nalmefene Subjects With Renal Impairment Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy young subject subject renal impairment Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) 5080 ml/min/1.73m2 , 30 < 50 ml/min/1.73m2 , < 30 ml/min/1.73m2 include study . The subject must BMI 19 32 kg/m2 . The subject history renal transplant undergo dialyse treatment . The subject , opinion investigator , unlikely comply protocol unsuitable reason . Other inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
